divs: Sighting Detailswas outside when i noticed what looked like fireworks but the flashes didnt fade and kept moving north from the south looked like a moving star constelation, 10-15 flashing red white and orange colors with the red appearing to circle around object in a flashing matter, the slow ones the ones in back seemed to speed up at will to catch others, but once again no sound it was quiet id say just above the cloud lines or below it, moving south to north
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Lee's Summit
There was one other sighting in Lee's Summit on or around June 8th 2012
Summary: there were like 10-15 flashing lights or blurbs flying s to n no sound, like a moving constelation
